text: Jennifer Love Hewitt emerges for the first time since heartbreaking death of her mother Jennifer Love Hewitt has emerged for the first time since her mother's death two weeks ago. The actress, 33, was spotted running errands outside her Los Angeles home yesterday, dressed in casual jeans, a T - shirt and cap. The Client List star was left devastated after her mother Patricia lost her battle with cancer at just 67.
